PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ProtectiveDeviceTypeFuseDisconnector
PropertySetDef.Definition: A coherent set of attributes representing the breakeing capacity of a fuse, defined in accordance with IEC 60269. Note - A protective device may be associated with different instances of this pSet providing information related to different basic characteristics.

PropertyDef.Name: FuseDisconnectorType
PropertyDef.Definition: A list of the available types of fuse disconnector from which that required may be selected where:\X\0D \X\0D EngineProtectionDevice: A fuse whose characteristic is specifically designed for the protection of a motor or generator.\X\0D FuseSwitchDisconnector: A switch disconnector in which a fuse link or a fuse carrier with fuse link forms the moving contact,\X\0D HRC: A standard fuse (High Rupturing Capacity)\X\0D OverloadProtectionDevice: A device that disconnects the supply when the operating conditions in an electrically undamaged circuit causes an overcurrent,\X\0D SemiconductorFuse: A fuse whose characteristic is specifically designed for the protection of sem-conductor devices.\X\0D SwitchDisconnectorFuse: A switch disconnector in which one or more poles have a fuse in series in a composite unit.

PropertyDef.Name: IC60269
PropertyDef.Definition: The breaking capacity in [A] for fuses in accordance with the IEC 60269 series.

PropertyDef.Name: PowerLoss
PropertyDef.Definition: The power loss in [W] of the fuse when the nominal current is flowing through the fuse.

PropertyDef.Name: VoltageLevel
PropertyDef.Definition: The voltage levels for which the data of the instance is valid. More than one value may be selected in the enumeration.
